name: sonic the hedgehog eats a chili dog

description:
originally a part of ＳＯＮＩＣ　ＮＩＧＨＴＭＡＲＥ, a small compilation of sonic fanart i made earlier in the year to celebrate his birthday. i decided to upload this on its own because uhh why not.
